blogs.author: Bangkok Post Public Company Limited
blogs.title: Seastead couple in crosshairs
blogs.description: The Third Naval Area Command has filed a police complaint against an American man and his Thai wife who set up a floating living platform 12 nautical miles off the coast of Phuket, a practice also known as seasteading.
